attributes.action: Deport Anjem Choudary and his followers.
attributes.additional_details:
Anjem Choudary and his followers do not wish to be part of secular Britain and only wish to kill, maim and denigrate those who do so.
He is a bit like the eu - of absolutely no use to anyone but himself and his acolytes.
He and his followers are parasitical, dishonest and are best sent back to their country of origin with their families in order that their human right to a family life is upheld.
